title: Best of The Program | 9/20/21
description:
Glenn shares his letter to the prime minister of Pakistan and shares how our State Department is standing in the way. Glenn reads the Pakistani prime minister's response to his plea for help in rescuing Afghans. Glenn and Stu attempt to discuss Nancy Pelosi’s statement on capitalism without their heads exploding.
